title: Keurig K-Compact Single-Serve K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker, Black (Packaging May Vary)
descriptions:
Here is a product listing based on the provided JSON data summaries:

**Product Name:** Keurig K-Compact Single-Serve K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker, Black

**Description:**

Start your day off right with the Keurig K-Compact Single-Serve K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker. This compact coffee maker is designed to fit perfectly on your countertop, with a slim width of just 8 inches.

**Brewing Features:**

* Choose from three brew sizes: 6, 8, or 10 oz
* Quick brewing time of under a minute
* Smart Start feature allows you to brew your coffee immediately

**Water Reservoir:**

* 36 oz water reservoir capacity
* Removable for easy refilling and cleaning

**Energy Efficiency:**

* Automatic shut-off feature turns off the coffee maker after 2 hours of inactivity
* Energy efficient design helps save energy and reduce waste

**Drip Tray:**

* Removable drip tray for easy cleaning and maintenance
* Accommodates travel mugs up to 7 inches tall
* Holds full accidental brew for mess-free cleanup

**Additional Features:**

* Dispense hot water for tea, soup, or oatmeal
* Button controls for easy operation
* Compatible with a wide range of K-Cup varieties and the My K-Cup Universal Reusable Coffee Filter

**Dimensions:**

* Width: 8 inches

**Note:** Packaging may vary.

Order your Keurig K-Compact Single-Serve K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker today and start enjoying a perfect cup of coffee every time!

**Product Title:** Keurig K-Compact Single-Serve K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker, Black

**Product Description:**

Start your day off right with the Keurig K-Compact Single-Serve K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker. This compact and efficient coffee maker is designed to fit seamlessly into your daily routine.

**Key Features:**

* Brews in under a minute: Get your favorite hot beverage quickly and easily
* 3 brew sizes: Choose from 6, 8, or 10 oz cups to suit your needs
* 36 oz water reservoir: Removable and easy to refill
* Smart Start: Automatically turns on and off for added convenience
* Button controls: Simple and intuitive interface
* Energy efficient: Auto-off feature turns off the coffee maker after 2 hours of inactivity
* Removable drip tray: Accommodates travel mugs up to 7 inches tall and catches any accidental brews
* Hot water dispense: Perfect for making tea, hot chocolate, or instant soups

**Dimensions:**

* Width: 8 inches

**Compatibility:**

* Compatible with K-Cup pods and Keurig Universal My K-Cup Reusable Coffee Filter

**Order now and start enjoying your favorite hot beverages with the convenience and ease of the Keurig K-Compact Single-Serve K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker!**

Here is a product listing based on the provided JSON data summaries:

**Keurig K-Compact Single-Serve K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker, Black**

**Brew Your Perfect Cup in Under a Minute!**

The Keurig K-Compact Single-Serve K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker is a compact and convenient coffee maker that allows you to brew a fresh cup of coffee in no time. With its sleek black design, it's perfect for small kitchens, apartments, or offices.

**Key Features:**

* **Brew Sizes:** Choose from 3 brew sizes: 6 oz, 8 oz, or 10 oz
* **Fast Brewing:** Brew a cup of coffee in under a minute
* **36 oz Water Reservoir:** Removable and easy to refill
* **Smart Start:** Automatically turns on when you insert a K-Cup pod
* **Button Controls:** Easy to use and navigate
* **Energy Efficient:** Auto-off feature turns off the coffee maker after 2 hours of inactivity
* **Removable Drip Tray:** Accommodates travel mugs up to 7 inches tall and catches full accidental brews
* **Hot Water Dispense:** Dispense hot water for tea, hot chocolate, or instant soups
* **Compact Design:** Only 8 inches wide, perfect for small spaces

**Compatibility:**

* **K-Cup Pods:** Compatible with a wide variety of K-Cup pods
* **My K-Cup Reusable Coffee Filter:** Also compatible with Keurig's reusable coffee filter (sold separately)

**Note:** Packaging may vary.

Order your Keurig K-Compact Single-Serve K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker today and start enjoying a perfect cup of coffee every time!
